snippet: Steve Stricker lost all but one stroke of a five-shot lead by the back nine but ran off four straight birdies for a four-under-par 69 to reclaim that advantage after three rounds of the Tournament of Champions.
abstract: Steve Stricker holds on to third-round lead at Tournament of Champions; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Steve Stricker lost all but one stroke of a five-shot lead by the back nine but ran off four straight birdies for a four-under-par 69 to reclaim that advantage after three rounds of the Tournament of Champions.
